name: Bren's Italian Meatballs
author: Bren
summary: The perfect addition to any tomato sauce.
ingredients: ½ cup grated pecorino Romano cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Toss bread crumbs, Romano cheese, garlic, parsley, black pepper, red pepper, and egg together in a bowl; mix in beef gently with your hands
Form beef mixture into meatballs roughly 1 1/4 inches in diameter; place on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes; turn meatballs and bake until no longer pink at the center, about 5 minutes more
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
